original_title: Thomas Anders ‎– The Gentleman Of Music / Live In Concert
overview: THOMAS ANDERS was born on 1 March 1963 and is one of the few German stars who can be said to have made both a national and international impact on music history. During his time with Modern Talking, he enjoyed countless chart successes that spread his fame to almost every corner of the earth.  “You’re my heart, you’re my soul”, for example, reached number 1 in 81 countries.
title: Thomas Anders ‎– The Gentleman Of Music / Live In Concert
